name: The Scramble for Toilet Paper
description:
Story

The people are rushing into the store to buy all the toilet paper! Use your bathroom-made turrets to stop them from taking everything!

Context

This is my first ever game I did entirely on my own ! (except for the music) So I'm really proud of it, even if it's not that good, because I had fun making it and it taught me a lot about game development :)

It was made for the Quarantine GameJam

Credits

The music is made by LeoKing

Warning

There appears to be some bugs if you don't play with 16:9 ration, so I definitely recommend it
